pageContent: Introduction: The International Index of Erectile Function (IIEF) is the predominant patient-reported outcomes instrument for assessing male sexual function. There are obvious problems with the use of the IIEF in the assessment of an individual patient, such as for men who use injections and men who do not engage in intercourse.

metaData.source:
Anatomy of Denonvilliers' fascia and pelvic nerves, impotence, and implications for the colorectal surgeon
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/11044153/
